ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Cluster-Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) Data
ResourceHeader.Description: The Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) experiment provides magnetic field power spectral density values parallel and perpendicular to the magnetic field and the electric field power spectral density values for several frequency ranges. For more details of the Cluster mission, the spacecraft, and its instruments, see the report Cluster: mission, payload and supporting activities, March 1993, ESA SP-1159, and the included article The STAFF (Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Field Fluctuations) Experiment for the Cluster Mission, by N. Cornilleau-Wehrlin et al., from which this information was obtained.

InformationURL.Name: NSSDC Master Catalog listing for Cluster II Samba Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF)
InformationURL.Description: This site provides information concerning the Cluster II Samba Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations Instrument.

NumericalData.ProviderResourceName: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) Data

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Universal Time in data cell: day, month, year hour, min, seconds. Ex: 01-Jan-1981 00:00:00.000.

Parameter.Name: Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) status at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Wave Experiment Consortium (WEC) Status
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) Wave Experiment Consortium (WEC) status at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Parallel to Bo (0.3-10 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power parallel to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 0.3-10 Hz (f1) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Parallel to Bo (10-180 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power parallel to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 10-180 Hz (f2) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Parallel to Bo (180-4000 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power parallel to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 180-4000 Hz (f3) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Perpendicular to Bo (0.3-10 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power perpendicular to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 0.3-10 Hz (f1) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Perpendicular to Bo (10-180 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power perpendicular to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 10-180 Hz (f2) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Spectral Power Perpendicular to Bo (180-4000 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) magnetic field spectral power perpendicular to the mean magnetic ﬁeld as measured by the onboard Cluster Fluxgate Magnetometer (FGM) in the 180-4000 Hz (f3) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Electric Field Spectral Power (10-180 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) electric field spectral power in the 10-180 Hz (f2) frequency range at spin time resolution

Parameter.Name: Electric Field Spectral Power (180-4000 Hz)
Parameter.Description: Cluster II Samba Prime Parameter Spatio-Temporal Analysis of Magnetic Field Fluctuations (STAFF) electric field spectral power in the 180-4000 Hz (f3) frequency range at spin time resolution
